price: Èsì ọ̀rọ̀ yó sì fọ́jú pọ̀ mọ́ wọn lọ́wọ́ ní ọjọ́ yẹn; wọn kò sì níí bira wọn léèrè ìbéèrè.¹
arabic: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faʿamiyat ʿalayhimu al-anbāu yawma-idhin fahum lā yatasāalūna
